scripts.fetch: openapi-generator-cli generate -i pet.swagger.json -g typescript-fetch -o typescript-fetch -p typescriptThreePlus=true
scripts.fetch:6: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}:/local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i /local/pet.swagger.json -g typescript-fetch -o /local/typescript-fetch-6 -p supportsES6=true,typescriptThreePlus=true
